query.statement:
UPDATE SAPHEE.ZWBAP02 SET
SEQSTAT = CASE WHEN CAST(#SEQSTAT# AS CHAR(1)) > '' THEN CAST(#SEQSTAT# AS CHAR(1)) ELSE SEQSTAT END , APDATE = HEX(CURRENT DATE) , APTIM = HEX(CURRENT TIME) WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND DOCNO = #DOCNO# AND DOCKIND = #DOCKIND# AND APPGUBN = #APPGUBN# AND SEQNO = #SEQNO#
